name: SSF4
title: Site-Specific Factor 4
subtitle: Size of Largest Metastasis
notes:
**Note 1:**  Record the size of the largest diameter of the largest metastasis in any site, including distant lymph node or distant organ.  
* Do not record the size of the metastasis in a regional lymph node

**Note 2:**  The metastasis may be measured either clinically or pathologically.
rows: Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
Described as "less than 8 cm," or "greater than 3 cm," or "between 3 cm and 8 cm"

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
